titleStmt.title: An alarum: to the last warning peece to London by way of answer: discovering the danger of sectaries suffered: and the necessity of order, and vniformity to bee established. Wherein the Presbiterian way of government, and the Independant liberty, is compared.
titleStmt.author: Smith, George, 1602 or 3-1658.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: George Smith Gent.
A reply to: The last warning to all the inhabitants of London (Wing L512).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
